lore: Aggressive light infantry, Incursors specialise in storming enemy defences and destroying essential assets. With a formidable array of auspexes and sensory equipment, they can see their enemies through walls and predict their movements â€“ and with a burst of carbine fire or knife thrusts, cut them down.

otherAbilities.name: Multi-spectrum Array:
otherAbilities.description: In your Shooting phase , after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more attacks made by this unit this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll .

wargear.description: One Incusor can be equipped with 1 haywire mine.
